column1: #Text=I am seeking a solution to detect the occurrence of a user clicking the "OK" button within an AlertDialog.
#Text=To accomplish this, it is necessary to establish a listener for the positive button by employing the setPositiveButton method.
#Text=For reference, please find the attached C++ code, which demonstrates the implementation of an AlertDialog in the NDK C++ environment.
